pullrequest.title: Logging Part 1: Misc changes to ignition transport

content.raw:
I've confirmed that these failures are recreated on my Windows virtual machine. When I tested the `default` branch instead, only one failure occurred, but that may have been a race condition on a flaky test, as opposed to a logic error.

I've begun investigating the cause. I'll post an update as soon as I've found something.
content.html:
I've confirmed that these failures are recreated on my Windows virtual machine. When I tested the default branch instead, only one failure occurred, but that may have been a race condition on a flaky test, as opposed to a logic error.

I've begun investigating the cause. I'll post an update as soon as I've found something.
